name: Human Cannonball - Cannon Man [A26]
description:
Charge that cannon and become the best Human Cannonball in existence.
How many platforms can you reach? Hone your skills and faceplant your way to eternal glory!

--- FEATURES ---
- One touch gameplay, perfect for that subway ride
- Unlockable helper items, costumes and cannons
- If you like pixel art: Well ... it's got Pixel Art
- If you don't like pixel art: Small app size for your downloading convenience, due to small texture sizes (you might consider changing your view on pixel art)
- iCloud sync between all your devices
- Achievements
- Gameplay recording so you can share your best death plummets and faceplants with your friends and enviers
- And best of all: Free-to-Enjoy

Now faceplant away!

Also: Every review is very much appreciated!
